name: Flight Of The Wizard
description:
Fly from planet to planet on a journey to defeat your archnemesis - the Evil Wizard. Watch out for robots, though.

A short sidescroller shoot'em up to pass the time. 

Features:

  • Four cool weapons to choose from.
  • Three and a half epic levels to explore.
  • One secret level to unlock.
  • Cute cat outfit.
  • And an incredibly detailed gripping story of a wizard on a path of revenge.
